tool.name: qiime2 quality-control decontam-score-viz
tool.description: Generate a histogram representation of the scores

param.name: decontam_scores
param.label: decontam_scores: Collection[FeatureData[DecontamScore]]
param.help: [required] Output from decontam identify to be visualized

param.name: table
param.label: table: Collection[FeatureTable[Frequency]]
param.help: [required] Raw OTU/ASV table that was used as input to decontam-identify

param.name: threshold
param.label: threshold: Float
param.help: [default: 0.1] Select threshold cutoff for decontam algorithm scores

param.name: weighted
param.label: weighted: Bool
param.help: [default: Yes] weight the decontam scores by their associated read number

param.name: bin_size
param.label: bin_size: Float
param.help: [default: 0.02] Select bin size for the histogram

tool.help:
QIIME 2: quality-control decontam-score-viz =========================================== Generate a histogram representation of the scores
Outputs: -------- :visualization.qzv: <no description>
|
Description: ------------ Creates histogram based on the output of decontam identify
|
